content:
I set up an free organization. All went well for a couple of days. The last thing I did was try the data export. It worked. But now I can't reply to any message or start a new topic. Also the manage users tab just spins. Have I corrupted the database?
There are many features that aren't working. I just tried to generate an invite link and it failed.
@Gary Coulter Is that on your own server, or is your organization hosted on zulipchat.com?
That is an invite I generated before I broke it.
My team will be meeting over the next couple of hours about zulip. I'll get them to give me some feedback, as well.
What exactly happens when you try to send a message for example?
I never see the box to enter a message to send.
I use r or ENTER and nothing happens.

I just joined there.
It seems to work with PMs(I messaged welcome bot). Is it specific to a stream?
It seems to be all streams. I don't see that you joined, either.

Okay, I fixed it by logging out and logging back in. Thanks so much for your help. I was starting to panic as our zoom meeting about zulip starts in 30 minutes and I think I'm the only one to set up a realm, so far. We will be hosting our own server, eventually.
I may try to reproduce the problem after our meeting.
